title: Rough Love (Screaming Demons MC Book 9)
features: When she died, he fought for years to keep her alive in his memory.But now, with Mia, he’s found love again.And he doesn’t want to lose it, he can’t.He needs to move on.He needs to finally let Laura go.But when the past doesn’t stay in the past…How do you let it go?
description: Totally Awesome - Merry J E ★★★★★What an incredible ending to this phenomenal series!!! - Cheryl B ★★★★★Amazing - Great Series - Merita ★★★★★Filled with intrigue, twists and heat this was a fitting end to this captivating series - Ruggrat ★★★★★It's a fast-paced and continuation from the previous book that will keep you engaged from start to finish. - Irene T ★★★★★This is a brilliant story that I would definitely recommend - Adele D ★★★★★AWESOME story, give me more from this author!!!!!!!!!! - ruth ★★★★★Yes! Exciting ending - Linda C ★★★★★Perfect Ending - Suzanne G. ★★★★★Suspenseful & would recommend - Patricia H ★★★★★Amazing series - jeannie ★★★★★Love this entire Series - Christine R ★★★★★...i was blown away! - Andrea ★★★★★I can't believe this is the last book in this series. �� But, what a helluva fantastic ending. - book lover ★★★★★This series is 1 to own if like me you're a MC fan - Andie ★★★★★I loved this book and can't wait to see what Summer and Sienna have for us next! - Cynthia H ★★★★★Fantastic Book - ITAngel ★★★★★Outstanding MC read. - Kazza ★★★★★so much has been thoughout the series roller coaster of emotions experiences, lost, grief past and present - Arudedg ★★★★★So much more than I was expecting! - Heidy ★★★★★An Amazing Swan Song for the Series. - Marti ★★★★★Great Read - April ★★★★★AN ABSOLUTELY AWESOME SERIES - Catherine G ★★★★★Engrossing - Lene N ★★★★★Amazing Story - AmberJ ★★★★★This book hooked me from the get go I just couldn't put it down I fell in love with these characters and omg what a story just a perfect - Jeanne A K ★★★★★Just Awesome!! - Katheleen B ★★★★★The characters were wonderfully written and had amazing chemistry between them. - S. Green ★★★★★Brilliant series - BevHarro ★★★★★Must Read Series. - JJ ★★★★★
